
######################################
# AUTOGENERATED on 2025-09-05 10:15:25.715828                #
######################################
xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_start_button_effect = {
    potential = { always = yes }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = tooltip_xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_points_left
        custom_tooltip = tooltip_xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_picks_left
        custom_tooltip = tooltip_xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_total_cost
        custom_tooltip_fail = {
            text = xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_should_pick_any_trait.fail
            xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_picked_any_class_trigger = yes
        }
        custom_tooltip_fail = {
            text = xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_should_pick_any_skill_level.fail
            xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_picked_any_skill_level_trigger = yes
        }
        custom_tooltip_fail = {
            text = xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_not_enough_resources_to_pay_cost.fail
            resource_stockpile_compare = { 
                resource = energy value >= 1 
                mult = xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_costs_count_energy
            }
            resource_stockpile_compare = { 
                resource = alloys value >= 1
                mult = xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_costs_count_alloys
            }
        }
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = tooltip_xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_points_left
        custom_tooltip = tooltip_xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_picks_left
        custom_tooltip = tooltip_xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_total_cost
        custom_tooltip = tooltip_xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_start_number
        hidden_effect = {
            while = {
                log = "Clicked Leader Assembly button. Want to deduct [This.xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_costs_count_energy] energy."
                log = "Clicked Leader Assembly button. Want to deduct [This.xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_costs_count_alloys] alloys."
                add_resource = { energy = -1 mult = xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_costs_count_energy }
                add_resource = { alloys = -1 mult = xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_costs_count_alloys }
                if = {
                    limit = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_class_set_to_official }
                    create_leader = {
                        class = official #set the leader's class first
                        species = this.species
                        set_age = 1
                        randomize_traits = no #remove randomized traits of the newly created leader
                        custom_description = xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_backstory
                        effect = { save_event_target_as = xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_target }
                    }
                    #and add traits for the leader
                    #official

#official
event_target:xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_target = {
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_official_leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_official_leader_trait_architectural_interest } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_architectural_interest show_message = no } }

                    limit = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_class_set_to_scientist }
                    create_leader = {
                        class = scientist
                        species = this.species
                        set_age = 1
                        randomize_traits = no

#scientist
event_target:xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_target = {
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_scientist_leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_scientist_leader_trait_archaeologist_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_archaeologist_2 show_message = no } }

    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_scientist_leader_trait_xeno_cataloger } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_xeno_cataloger show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_scientist_subclass_scientist_explorer } } add_trait = { trait = subclass_scientist_explorer show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_scientist_subclass_scientist_councilor } } add_trait = { trait = subclass_scientist_councilor show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_scientist_subclass_scientist_governor } } add_trait = { trait = subclass_scientist_governor show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_scientist_subclass_scientist_scholar } } add_trait = { trait = subclass_scientist_scholar show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_scientist_xvcv_mdlc_leader_trait_memory_backup } } add_trait = { trait = xvcv_mdlc_leader_trait_memory_backup show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_scientist_xvcv_mdlc_leader_trait_shared_memory } } add_trait = { trait = xvcv_mdlc_leader_trait_shared_memory show_message = no } }
}
                }  # close else-if
                else_if = {
                    limit = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_class_set_to_commander }
                    create_leader = {
                        class = commander
                        species = this.species
                        set_age = 1
                        # event_leader = no #look for: xvcv_mdlc.30, 'is_event_leader = no' code
                        randomize_traits = no
                        custom_description = xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_backstory
                        effect = { save_event_target_as = xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_target }
                    }
                    #commander

#commander
event_target:xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_target = {
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_aggressive } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_aggressive show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_bureaucrat } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_bureaucrat show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_butcher } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_butcher show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_capitalist_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_capitalist_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_cautious } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_cautious show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_engineer } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_engineer show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_enlister } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_enlister show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_entrepreneur_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_environmental_engineer } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_environmental_engineer show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_fleet_logistician } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_fleet_logistician show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_gifted_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_gifted_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_homesteader_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_homesteader_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_iron_fist_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_iron_fist_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_private_mines_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_private_mines_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_restrained } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_restrained show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_righteous_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_righteous_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_scrapper_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_trickster } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_trickster show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_unyielding } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_unyielding show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_venerated_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_venerated_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_void_hunter_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_void_hunter_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_adventurous_spirit_3 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_adventurous_spirit_3 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_annihilator_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_annihilator_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_archaeo_specialization_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_archaeo_specialization_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_artillerist_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_artillerist_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_artillery_specialization_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_artillery_specialization_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_carrier_specialization_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_carrier_specialization_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_commanding_presence_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_commanding_presence_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_conscripter_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_conscripter_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_corsair_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_corsair_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_crusader_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_crusader_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_demolisher_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_demolisher_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_dreaded_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_dreaded_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_energy_weapon_specialist } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_energy_weapon_specialist show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_farming_focus_3 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_farming_focus_3 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_generator_focus_3 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_generator_focus_3 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_gunship_specialization_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_gunship_specialization_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_hardy_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_hardy_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_heavy_hitter_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_heavy_hitter_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_interrogator_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_interrogator_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_juryrigger_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_juryrigger_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_martinet_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_martinet_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_mining_focus_3 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_mining_focus_3 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_observant_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_observant_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_reinforcer_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_reinforcer_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_rocketry_specialization_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_rocketry_specialization_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_scout_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_scout_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_shipbreaker_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_shipbreaker_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_space_miner_3 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_space_miner_3 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_surgical_bombardment_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_surgical_bombardment_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_tactical_algorithms } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_tactical_algorithms show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_warden_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_warden_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_wrecker_2 } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_wrecker_2 show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_arbiter } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_arbiter show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_bellicose } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_bellicose show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_chainbreaker } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_chainbreaker show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_destiny_engineer } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_destiny_engineer show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_fortress_cracker } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_fortress_cracker show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_guerilla_tactics } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_guerilla_tactics show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_honored_warmaster } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_honored_warmaster show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_master_gunner } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_master_gunner show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_mediator } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_mediator show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_pirate_queen } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_pirate_queen show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_supreme_warrior } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_supreme_warrior show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_surveyor } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_surveyor show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_survivalist } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_survivalist show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_taskmaster } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_taskmaster show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_leader_trait_trophy_hunter } } add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_trophy_hunter show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_subclass_commander_general } } add_trait = { trait = subclass_commander_general show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_subclass_commander_councilor } } add_trait = { trait = subclass_commander_councilor show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_subclass_commander_governor } } add_trait = { trait = subclass_commander_governor show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_subclass_commander_admiral } } add_trait = { trait = subclass_commander_admiral show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_xvcv_mdlc_leader_trait_memory_backup } } add_trait = { trait = xvcv_mdlc_leader_trait_memory_backup show_message = no } }
    if = { limit = { prev = { has_country_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_commander_xvcv_mdlc_leader_trait_shared_memory } } add_trait = { trait = xvcv_mdlc_leader_trait_shared_memory show_message = no } }
}
                }
                #then the skill level and other things at last
                # event_target:xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_target = {
                #     log = "Going to make leader at level \\[root.xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_skill_level]"
                #     set_skill = root.xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_skill_level
                #     set_leader_flag = xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_target_leader
                # }
                # count = xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_start_number
                oxr_mdlc_leader_making_create_leaders = {
                    count = xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_start_number
                }
            }
            xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_clear_values_effect = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_leader_tied_traits_add_effect = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_leader_tied_traits_remove_effect = yes
        }
    }
}
